title: [K-12] Short-Intensive Online Real-Time PPKN Character-Based Scientific Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic civic education concepts, experience with online learning tools, and foundational understanding of scientific inquiry methods (observation, hypothesis formulation, experimental design)
context.additional_context: Mixed-methods research (R&D) and Dick & Carey model application for developing PPKN characters linked to science curricula. Includes experimental designs considering scientific variables for character development and measuring educational effectiveness.

learning_goals: Learners analyze the 5S principles (smile, greeting, etiquette) using scientific observation methods and establish action plans for daily life application
Learners design strategies for forming honesty and hygiene habits reflecting religious/non-religious values using scientific inquiry methods
Learners propose approaches to cultivate aesthetic sensibility and scientific creativity through art activities (visual arts, music)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
